io.gearpump.cluster.client

ClientContext 

Companion object ClientContext

class ClientContext extends AnyRef

ClientContext is a user facing utility to interact with the master. (e.g. submit/manage an application).

Linear Supertypes
AnyRef, Any
Known Subclasses
RemoteClientContext, EmbeddedClientContext

  22.  def submit(app: Application, jar: String): RunningApplication
  23.  def submit(app: Application): RunningApplication

    Submits an application with default jar setting.

    Submits an application with default jar setting. Use java property "gearpump.app.jar" if defined. Otherwise, it assumes the jar is on the target runtime classpath, thus will not send the jar across the wire.
